trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> implementation so that you can use the weak event listener pattern to attach listeners for the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> 实现，以便可以使用弱事件侦听器模式附加 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> 事件的侦听器。

trans-unit.source: The source object that raises the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> 事件的源对象。

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> event.
Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的事件处理程序，当指定的源引发 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> 事件时进行调用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object to contain listeners to the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> 事件侦听器的新对象。

trans-unit.source: A new object to contain listeners to the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> 事件侦听器的新对象。

trans-unit.source: The source object that raises the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> 事件的源对象。

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> event.
Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.
trans-unit.target: 从指定源中移除指定的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The source object that raises the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> 事件的源对象。

trans-unit.source: Begins listening for the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: 开始对指定源侦听 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The source object that raises the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> 事件的源对象。

trans-unit.source: Stops listening for the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: 停止对指定源侦听 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.ErrorsChanged" /> 事件。
